mapper.insert: insert into commodity (CommodityCatagoryId, CommodityName, CommodityDes) values (#{commoditycatagoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commoditydes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
t1.CommodityId, t1.CommodityCatagoryId, t1.CommodityName, t1.CommodityDes
from commodity t1 join CommodityCatagory t2 on t1.CommodityCatagoryId = t2.CatagoryId
t1.CommodityName like concat('%',#{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t2.CatagoryName like concat('%',#{catagoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select
t1.CommodityId as commodityid, t1.CommodityCatagoryId as commoditycatagoryid, t1.CommodityName as commodityname, t1.CommodityDes as commoditydes
from commodity t1 join CommodityCatagory t2 on t1.CommodityCatagoryId = t2.CatagoryId
where t2.CatagoryId = #{value,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t1.CommodityId not in (select CommodityId from Shop)
